price: 79. Mayee’ waanu qori wuxuu sheegi, oo waan u fidin (kordhin) cadaabka fidin;
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
